Puzzle Solution:

1. the owner of the turtle is on the far left
2. the person eating orange is on the left of the person driving the car
3. the owner of the bird is between the russian and the owner of the cat
4. the person driving the subway is on the left of the person driving the bike
5. the person eating orange is on the right of the person driving the bike
6. the person driving the subway is on the right of the person eating avocado
7. the person eating mango is on the right of the owner of the chinchilla
8. the owner of the turtle is on the left of the spanish
9. the owner of the chinchilla is the person eating orange
10. the owner of the chinchilla is the italian
11. the owner of the hedgehog is the person eating pear
12. the person eating tomato is on the far left
13. the spanish is the person driving the motorbike
14. the person driving the train is on the left of the british
15. the person driving the car is on the far right
16. the turkish is on the left of the person driving the train
